api_list.name: Get Balance
api_list.description: Get balance with chain_id. ALSO Returns total USDT value.

api_list.name: Get Avaiable Chains
api_list.description: Returns all available chains with ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-portfolio.p.rapidapi.com/get_chains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-portfolio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-portfolio.p.rapidapi.com/get_chains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-portfolio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
